I don't think it is necessary to come into conclusions without having an inquiry into this matter. It has to involve the people from the medical profession mainly involvement of a psychiatric. In the western world, this is known as postnatal depression. So blaming/cursing the mother or the family is not a good omen.
What about the excuse of Karma?
Karma is not an excuse. It's a reason behind everything. This lady did this because of the illness she had. But this happened to babies because of their karma.
